message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. 60/40 seems fair considering I get to propose first.
Your initial offer was a bit imbalanced, Alice.  I propose a 55/45 split - it's a good deal considering the money shrinks with each round.
The money is losing value fast, Bob. I'm coming down a bit to 58/42, but that's my final offer.
Time is running out, Alice. I'm offering you 480,000 - it's better to take a decent deal now than risk losing even more to inflation.
Okay, Bob, let's be realistic. 55/45 is my final offer.  We both lose if this goes any further.
